title: and Gizelle Bryant
description:
Gizelle Bryant from the “Real Housewives of the Potomac” is telling it like it is when it comes to show drama, the real-life friendships of the cast, and how they got started on Bravo. She’s also detailing her love story with ex-hubby, Jamal Bryant, with whom she’s reconciled and plans to grow old! She shares what that’s been like for her personally, for them as a couple, and for her three daughters as a family. Plus, Lala & Randall talk wedding plans, and shout out Jessica Simpson for her sobriety!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
